Posts.Title: Final Departure Preparation
Posts.Subtitle: sample subtitle which is longer2
Posts.Notes: Shakedown Cruise for tomorrow's Departure. No Pumpout found at London City Pier. Bleeder Valve on Engine still leaking air into fuel line. Going to replace washer

Posts.Title: New Fuel Filter Test Sail
Posts.Notes: Quick test sail to run the improved engine. Motored and sailed. Light winds.

Posts.Title: Fishers Island Daytrip
Posts.Notes: Anchored off Fishers Island. Fixed contact on engine starter motor.

Posts.Title: Stuffing Box Inspection
Posts.Notes: Stuffing Box Inspection. While stopped dripping once per 2 minutes. Unable to notice drips while running.

Maintenance.Title: Filter Change
Maintenance.Notes: Changed the external and internal fuel filter on the Engine

Maintenance.Title: Bleeder Valve Washer Replacement
Maintenance.Notes: Reduced leakage of Diesel while running. Still small leak. Less noticable Diesel smell when Running
